term.name: MODS
term.definition: Metadata Object Description Schema - An XML schema for bibliographic metadata maintained by the Library of Congress

term.name: titleInfo
term.definition: Container for title information including main title, subtitle, and alternative titles

term.name: name
term.definition: Container for names of persons, organizations, conferences, or families associated with the resource

term.name: namePart
term.definition: Component of a name (family name, given name, date, etc.)

term.name: role
term.definition: Specifies the relationship between a name and the resource

term.name: roleTerm
term.definition: The specific role (author, editor, publisher, creator, etc.)

term.name: typeOfResource
term.definition: Broad category of resource content (text, cartographic, notated music, sound recording, etc.)

term.name: genre
term.definition: More specific categorization of the resource (article, report, guideline, thesis, etc.)

term.name: originInfo
term.definition: Container for publication and distribution information

term.name: publisher
term.definition: Entity responsible for making the resource available

term.name: dateIssued
term.definition: Date the resource was published or issued

term.name: place
term.definition: Geographic location associated with publication or creation

term.name: physicalDescription
term.definition: Container for physical or digital characteristics of the resource

term.name: internetMediaType
term.definition: MIME type of digital resource (e.g., application/pdf, text/html)

term.name: extent
term.definition: Physical size or duration (e.g., page count, file size)

term.name: abstract
term.definition: Summary or description of the resource content

term.name: subject
term.definition: Container for subject terms, topics, names, or geographic locations that describe the content

term.name: topic
term.definition: Subject term or keyword describing the content

term.name: identifier
term.definition: Unique identifier for the resource (DOI, ISBN, URL, etc.)

attributes.attribute: type: doi, isbn, issn, uri, local, etc.

term.name: language
term.definition: Container for language information about the resource

term.name: languageTerm
term.definition: Language code or text for the resource language

term.name: note
term.definition: General textual information about the resource

term.name: recordInfo
term.definition: Container for metadata about the MODS record itself (not the resource)

term.name: recordCreationDate
term.definition: Date the MODS record was created

term.name: recordContentSource
term.definition: Organization or entity that created the MODS record

term.name: relatedItem
term.definition: Information about related resources (NOT used for standalone documents)
term.note: For standalone documents, do NOT use relatedItem type="host"

term.name: part
term.definition: Information about parts of a resource (volume, issue, pages)
term.note: NOT used for standalone documents - only for articles within journals
